summary: Phase 3 testing completed successfully. All 47 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified Interviews CRUD, filters, export buttons, and statistics page with interview stats.

issues: Edit button uses lucide-edit-2 SVG icon without data-testid attribute - recommend adding data-testid for easier automated testing

passed_tests: Backend: Health check endpoint
Backend: Root API endpoint
Backend: User login/registration
Backend: Applications CRUD (create, read, update, delete)
Backend: Interviews CRUD - Create interview with all types (rh, technical, manager, final, other)
Backend: Interviews CRUD - Create interview with all formats (phone, video, in_person)
Backend: Interviews CRUD - Get interview by ID
Backend: Interviews CRUD - Update interview status (planned -> completed/cancelled)
Backend: Interviews CRUD - Update interview details (interviewer, location)
Backend: Interviews CRUD - Delete interview
Backend: Interviews - Filter by status (planned, completed)
Backend: Interviews - Get upcoming interviews with urgency indicator
Backend: Interviews - Invalid candidature returns 404
Backend: Export JSON - Returns valid JSON with applications and interviews
Backend: Export CSV - Returns valid CSV with headers
Backend: Export Excel - Returns valid XLSX file
Backend: Export Statistics Excel - Returns multi-sheet XLSX
Backend: Export - Requires authentication
Backend: Statistics - Dashboard with interview count
Backend: Statistics - Overview with interviews_stats
Frontend: Interviews page loads with filter buttons (Tous, Planifiés, Effectués)
Frontend: Create new interview via modal form
Frontend: Interview card displays with urgency indicator
Frontend: Delete interview with confirmation
Frontend: Statistics page with export buttons (Excel, JSON)
Frontend: Statistics page shows interview stats (Planifiés, Effectués, Annulés)
Frontend: Dashboard shows 'Prochains entretiens' section
Frontend: Dashboard shows 'Avec entretien' KPI
action_items: Consider adding data-testid attributes to interview card edit/delete buttons for easier automated testing
critical_code_review_comments: All Phase 3 features (Interviews CRUD, Export JSON/Excel) are fully functional
Interview urgency indicator correctly calculates time remaining
Export endpoints properly include interview data with applications
Statistics page correctly displays interview stats
seed_data_creation: Test interviews with TEST_ prefix were created and cleaned up after testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 3 complete. Interviews CRUD fully functional with all types (rh, technical, manager, final, other) and formats (phone, video, in_person). Export JSON/Excel working. Statistics page shows interview stats. Dashboard shows upcoming interviews section.

interviews_crud.create: Working - modal form with candidature dropdown, date/time, type, format, location, interviewer
interviews_crud.read: Working - list with cards, urgency indicators, filter by status
interviews_crud.update: Working - edit modal with status change (planned/completed/cancelled)
interviews_crud.delete: Working - confirmation dialog, removes from list

export.json: Working - downloads JSON with applications and interviews
export.excel: Working - downloads XLSX with formatted data
export.csv: Working - downloads CSV with semicolon delimiter

statistics.interview_stats: Working - shows Planifiés, Effectués, Annulés counts
statistics.export_buttons: Working - Excel and JSON export buttons visible

dashboard.with_interview_kpi: Working - shows count of applications with interviews
